The best words I'll save til last.
Sergio Garcia.
Major Champion.
It sounds so good. Seve would be proud ❤️🇪🇸
#Masters #golf #ForSeve
@thomasbjorngolf @TheSergioGarcia Well said. I totally agree!
Surely #Sergio will finally win The Open now. The pressure is off his back forever and he can play freely to win the one he craves #Masters
@TheSergioGarcia & @JustinRose99 What an afternoon you gave us. Two friends & European legends duelling it out. A credit to sport #Masters
Congratulations Sergio. I knew you'd do it. I've always supported you. Been a long wait but was worth it in the end ❤️ #Masters #ForSeve
@binfampho There was plenty tonight! #ForSeve
It's a joy seeing this! #Sergio #Masters #ForSeve https://t.co/RFT0SLbfnc
@TheSergioGarcia @JustinRose99 What a sporting, engrossing duel down the stretch. Henrik & Phil would be proud! ❤️ #Masters #bbcgolf
Seve would be so proud 🇪🇸. That it's on the legend's birthday, you kinda knew it was #Sergio's time ❤️ #ForSeve #Masters

@skynewsniall Hahaha. Have you been watching too? Bloody gripping to the last putt. I'm in tears Sergio finally did it!
Sergio finally wins a major. Is this an #alternativefact or #fakenews? 😉 #Masters #ForSeve #bbcgolf
Will never have to see Sergio's Wikipedia majors table again like this. Yes! #Sergio #Masters #bbcgolf https://t.co/C2S7eEiTIr

@MackerOnTheMed You too man. Enjoy the sun. Take care :)
@MackerOnTheMed Sergio's 3 tree-blocked shots on 7, 10 & 11 are an example of luck changing, for the better in this case: so I felt he might come back. 2/2
@MackerOnTheMed hahaha he's been drinking pond water his week. He had all the luck earlier on and that usually means it goes pear-shaped. 1/2
@MackerOnTheMed Totally agree. I forgot the Italians; Manassero has yet to reach his potential but he's still very young. Molinaris may have their day too.
@MackerOnTheMed Finally, Casey looks like a Masters champ, so does Rose. I'd be surprised if both these two don't win a green jacket.
@MackerOnTheMed There's also Olesen, Noren, Cabrera-Bello, Colsaerts, Levy, Dubuisson, Sullivan, Fisher and Wood; they all have the ability to win a major.
@MackerOnTheMed I'd love to see Lowry in green! Also hope Westy, Luuuuke & Poults take inspiration from Sergio, Henrik finally doing it. There's still time.
@MackerOnTheMed haha good choices. Makes sense. I'd add Tyrrell Hatton, Fleetwood, Jon Rahm, Pieters, Knox to the list of probables in the next decade.
@MackerOnTheMed So my tears of joy have subsided haha. Question for you: Who next of our Euro stars would you like to finally win a big one?

Oh Sergioooo. I'm in tears. Finally. At long last ❤️ #Masters #bbcgolf
Seeing Garcia & Rose's lasses hugging and laughing before the playoff just made me cry. A beautiful moment ❤️ #Masters #bbcgolf
@MackerOnTheMed Totally. One of the best finishes I've ever seen. Looked like a bad putt at first but on the replay maybe it didn't break?
@MackerOnTheMed So I was right then. A playoff. But he really should've hold that putt. Might yet get one more chance though...

What shots. What drama. What a finish. #Masters #bbcgolf

Rose v Garcia level pegging down the last. What a cracking back 9 #Masters #bbcgolf

@MackerOnTheMed I know. Blimey! The shot of a guy who is finally proving he's got what it takes. Only the best come back from his position on 13.
Momentum is everything in golf #Masters #bbcgolf
Yesss yesss yesss! What a thriller this is becoming. Sergio has got the chops you know. This a duel now -9 each #Masters #bbcgolf
